https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1sRejtiHOZGggZd9RcmdqbapLM5.jpg An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an extraordinary adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny in this magical and endearing story that proves nothing is impossibleâ€¦ A Boy Called Christmas
